inversity-flipped.$description: Very subtle background color for disabled states or extremely low contrast surfaces

inversity-normal.$description: Very subtle background color for disabled states or extremely low contrast surfaces

inversity-flipped.$description: Darker Heading Color for H6 only since it is a small font size, so it needs to be obviously strong when facing the body text.

inversity-normal.$description: Darker Heading Color for H6 only since it is a small font size, so it needs to be obviously strong when facing the body text.

inversity-flipped.$description: Used for spinner background alpha overlay

inversity-normal.$description: Used for spinner background alpha overlay

inversity-flipped.$description: Used as bg in 2nd and 3d buttons

inversity-normal.$description: Used as bg in 2nd and 3d buttons

inversity-flipped.$description: Foreground color for disabled state of Text links, secondary and tertiary buttons etc. on inverse background.

inversity-normal.$description: Foreground color for disabled state of Text links, secondary and tertiary buttons etc. on inverse background.

inversity-flipped.$description: For background of disabled elements. Inverse background. Opacity version.

inversity-normal.$description: For background of disabled elements. Inverse background. Opacity version.

inversity-flipped.$description: For background of disabled elements. Inverse background. Solid version.

inversity-normal.$description: For background of disabled elements. Inverse background. Solid version.

inversity-flipped.$description: Used for text-links as a border color of the focus state.

inversity-normal.$description: Used for text-links as a border color of the focus state.
